item.title: Sea Fantasy
item.description:
Title: Sea Fantasy
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: METASLA
Publisher: METASLA
Release Date: Jan 7, 2025




About This Game

Save the world by fishing!
A new pixel open world action rpg!
This is the story of two young men who set out on an adventure to fish for the SeaAZ, the marine creatures of this world.

Fishing action .
When you find a fish shadow, match the marker and throw the rod. Match the timing of the gauge to reduce the health of the SeaAZ and catch the SeaAZ! Don't forget to strip the materials from the SeaAZ you caught.
.

Adventure by ship .
Explore the vast pixel world freely by boat.
.

Dungeon Exploration .
There is more than just fishing. There may be dungeons on the islands you land on by boat. Explore them and get treasures! But beware of traps...
.

Craft
Create new fishing rods and hooks using materials obtained from the SeaAZ.
.

Epic Story .
This is not a peaceful fishing game. The destruction of the world is imminent...
.



Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10, Windows 11
    • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8600 or AMD Phenom II X4 945
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 230 or Nvidia GeForce GT 520
    • Storage: 1 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10, Windows 11
    • Processor: AMD FX 4300 or Intel Core i3 2120
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 340X or Nvidia GeForce GTS 450
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 1 GB available space

item.title: Beyond Citadel
item.description:
Title: Beyond Citadel
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: doekuramori
Publisher: doekuramori
Release Date: Jan 2, 2025




About This Game

The Citadel, the last stronghold of mankind's resistance against the Apocalypse, has fallen. Humankind is now under the control of the Trumpeters of the Apocalypse, the leaders of the forces of the Apocalypse. The “Martyr” who is the last resort of the Seven Angels, the guardians of humankind, is led by a mysterious signal and sets out on a journey to overthrow the Trumpeters of the Apocalypse.

To find the truth behind the signal, buried under the Citadel.

Beyond Citadel is a single-player FPS inspired by the FPS classics of the 90’s, featuring anime style 2.5D graphics and realistic gunplay mechanics.


◆Various weapons of realistic gunplay

・From black powder firearms to futuristic energy weapons.

・Each weapon requires different handling.

・Conditions of the weapons decrease on firing and sometimes they can be jammed.


◆Various locations and tough opponents

・Explore the fortress and acquire new skill

・In-door and out-door hand-crafted levels

・From foot soldiers to armored vehicles… and horrific hostile creatures!


◆Atmospheric world and unique characters

・You are not alone. Your allies will aid you on your journey.

・Intense destructive effects color the dark futuric world.


Overthrow the Trumpeters and cancel the Apocalypse.

The world is relying on you…

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel Core i-7-7700HQ CPU @2.80GHz
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 Home 64-bit
    • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9750H CPU @ 2.60GHz
    • Memory: 32 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space

item.title: Talented
item.description:
Title: Talented
Genre: Action , Indie
Developer: TurtleFox Games
Publisher: TurtleFox Games
Release Date: Dec 20, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Oct 30, 2023




About This Game

When Ed accepted the challenge of surviving exactly 20 days and 20 nights in The Demonic Conveyor Belt (D.C.B), he thought his Elite Mastery Professor had been exaggerating that it was 'the most feared dungeon of all'. This thought quickly disappeared into the fog surrounding him, when he passed through the gates of the dungeon to find the largest eyeball he'd ever seen. Would he forever remain just Ed, or could he become Talent Ed?

Talented is an arcade roguelite shoot 'em up with randomly generated skill trees. Survive 20 nights and defeat the dungeon to unlock all six classes, each with unlockable talents, abilities and challenges.

Send a hail of arrows, conjure powerful spells, brew unique potions, or call upon an army of snails to hold back the demons. The possibilities are endless.

  • Craft your own builds, with over 500 Talents to learn

  • Obliterate your foes, with over 100 abilities

  • Explore a new talent tree every run with randomly generated skill trees

  • Go Endless and push your builds to their limit

  • Master six classes, each with its own playstyle

  • Customise your character's loadout with class specific traits and skins

  • Challenge yourself, with 25 mastery levels

  • Explore new ways to play, with 10 challenges per class

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10+
    • Processor: 2.1 Ghz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Storage: 250 MB available space

item.title: Rocksmith® 2014 Edition REMASTERED LEARN & PLAY
item.description:
Title: Rocksmith® 2014 Edition REMASTERED LEARN & PLAY
Genre: Casual , Simulation
Developer: Ubisoft - San Francisco , Ubisoft - Osaka
Publisher: Ubisoft
Release Date: Dec 19, 2024




About This Game

Rocksmith 2014 Remastered is back by popular demand! Whether you're a beginner or an experienced player, it's a fantastic way to learn guitar or bass at your own pace, now available in an all-new 2024 edition. Get ready to rock (again)!

In 2023, Rocksmith 2014 Remastered was temporarily removed due to the expiration of our music licensing deals. While we believe Rocksmith+ offers the ultimate destination for learning guitar, bass and piano with its extensive music catalog, we have also heard the Rocksmith 2014 community’s feedback. You asked for Rocksmith 2014 Remastered to return, so we did just that! We have been hard at work to deliver a special version giving you the choice to own your songs and enjoy popular features like Guitarcade and Session Mode.

Introducing Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play Edition!

WHAT'S NEW IN THIS EDITION?

While Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play retains all the core features you love, we’ve replaced all licensed songs with a collection of tracks and exercises from our popular downloadable content bundles. This includes:

• Bachsmith and Bachsmith II

• Classic Melody Song Pack

• Rocksmith Easy Exercises, Vol. 1 & 2

• Rocksmith Intermediate Exercises, Vol. 1 & 2

• Rocksmith Advanced Exercises, Vol. 1 & 2

These bundles cover a wide range of techniques and musical styles to help you develop your skills and learn new ones.

Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play Edition is identical to the original in all other aspects. You can still easily learn songs thanks to the 3D Noteway, enjoy Multiplayer with friends, or refine your skills with Riff Repeater. Best of all, the downloadable songs from the original Rocksmith 2014 Remastered are fully compatible with Learn & Play Edition, allowing you to easily create your own personalized song library. Our home-made official content is carefully craftedto sound and play like a fined tuned guitar, so if you want to find the best song versions, you know where to come!

LEARN & PLAY YOUR FAVORITE SONGS

Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play Edition is a great and fun way to learn and play real music, focusing on the songs you love. Whether you're picking up your first guitar or aiming to perfect advanced techniques, the game adapts to your skill level and offers comprehensive practice tools and options, ensuring you progress quickly, no matter where you start.

Join millions of players who have already mastered guitar using Rocksmith's award-winning method. Using a Real Tone Cable, simply plug any real guitar or bass into your PC to start your musical journey today!!

IMPORTANT NOTES

• If you already own Rocksmith 2014 Remastered on Steam, please be aware that you won’t be able to download the Learn & Play edition to avoid losing your original base game’s licensed music.

• We are aware of an issue preventing new users from creating a Uplay account with the current password requirements. The correct password guidelines are:

o 8 to 16 characters

o At least 1 lowercase letter

o At least 1 uppercase letter

o At least 1 number

o At least 1 special character

o Passwords must not contain your username

Please note that additional downloadable songs cannot be purchased directly via the in-game store interface and need to be purchased directly via the Steam store instead. Once purchased, those additional downloadable songs will be added to the game's song list automatically.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
    Minimum:
    • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 8
    • Processor: 2.66 GHz Intel Core2 Duo E6750 or 2.8 GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 256 MB DirectX 9 / NVIDIA® GeForce® 8600 GT or ATI Radeon™ HD 2600 XT
    • Hard Drive: 12 GB HD space
    • Sound: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
      Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
    Recommended:
    • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 8
    • Processor: 3.1 GHz Intel Core i3-540 or 3.3 GHz Athlon II X3 455
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 512MB Nvidia GT 240 or 512 MB ATI Radeon HD 5670
    • Hard Drive: 12 GB HD space
    • Sound: DirectX 9.0c-compliant
      Originally released for Windows 7, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS

item.title: KLETKA
item.description:
Title: KLETKA
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Early Access
Developer: Callback , ln404
Publisher: Callback , ln404
Release Date: Dec 13, 2024
Early Access Release Date: Dec 13, 2024




About This Game

The most dangerous criminals are convicted and sent to Kletka. Your sentence is to descend into the depths of the Gigastructure while maintaining a living and hungry elevator. Never forget to feed it if you don't want to end up being eaten alive. Kletka is omnivorous, be ready to feed it both fuel and flesh.

The Gigastructure is an endlessly expanding building. Traps and anomalies fill the corridors. Any stop you make could be your last.

Samosbor is a mysterious anomaly that kills anything in its path. This terrifying phenomenon is feared by all inhabitants as no one has ever survived it. When you hear the siren than it's time to drop everything and run to the elevator as fast as you can. Kletka is the only thing that can protect you from this anomaly.

Form a team of up to six people and descend in the elevator. Friends tend to survive when they work together, but friends also make for good fuel.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game contains the occasional appearance of blood and human body parts, acts of murder.



System Requirements

Windows

Linux
